api_data.job_title: Walk-in-interview for the position of  Sales & Marketing Executive  - Mumbai

jd_information.description: We are Opening for the position of"Sales & Marketing Executive" - Mumbai Company Name: Sky Enterprises Interview & Location: Office no.-503, 5th Floor, Cheda Arcade, Near Gold Cinema,Above J.K.Classes, Thane West.Experience: 00 month – 2 years (Freshers also applied)Salary: Rs 1.5 Lakh / Yr to Rs 2.0 Lakh / YrJob Description:1. Self-motivated.2. Attending to all appointments, giving appropriate product presentations & converting them into sales. 3. Explain the customers - based on product offers / benefits.4. Explaining the destination packages & other packages.5. Generating own leads from the market for more presentations & sales.6. Clients relationship to generate successful referral leads. Education: 10th or 12th pass/Graduate/Under-graduate If you are interested in this position please forward your resume at"sarfarajsky786@gmail.com"Also we kindly request you to forward the above opportunity to your friends/ refer some of your friends or colleagues who are seeking change in their career. Best Regards,Sky EnterprisesSarfaraj Rauf Bhojani9766828209/8108383468
